title: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box.
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc'. Set 'aa' as the default value and click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, change 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.

OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.

EB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter should be retained even after modifying the default value.

SR: 1. Create a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box.
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc'. Set 'aa' as the default value and click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, change 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog again to verify that the default value is still 'aaa'.
